name: Enter The Group
overview:
EnterTheGroup.com is an in-development stage website whose goal is to allow students to manage their group projects online while also learning project management skills.

The website will provide people with the tools they need to start up and manage a collaborative project. These tools currently include the ability to create multiple private or public group pages, group or personal task lists, calendars, project outline templates and much more.

Most people, for many reasons, find group projects difficult. Our goals is to provide them with knowledge, taken from the project management skill set, to make their work more efficient and enjoyable. This involves providing them with a variety of articles and videos on topics such as how to run a meeting to better communication methods to writing a project outline. We believe that this knowledge is crucial to becoming a better student today and more skilled employee or entrepreneur tomorrow.

Their website will be open to first stage testing in early 2010.
